thread.title: Can"t find a better place to stay when in Rome.
thread.title_full: Can"t find a better place to stay when in Rome. - Review of Hotel Scalinata di Spagna, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: ThomasJfromCA
title: Can"t find a better place to stay when in Rome.
text: Stayed there previously very much like smaller hotels, service and staff excellent---will stay there anytime in Rome, convenient to everywhere in the city after all town was built way before subways ,taxis, and busses. Also very close to many places to eat and very close to shopping.
